inclusion.criterion: Willingness to comply with study restrictions of not using alcohol, coffee etc during the hours specified below prior to each study day
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic disease requiring continuous medication or harden the participation in the study as judged by the investigator
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic pain such as pain that is constant and impairs quality of life
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Consumption of medications during the last 7 days prior the study day, not including contraceptives
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Consumption of nature medicine or supplements that results in a increased intake of a specific compound that isn't a nutrient during the last 7 days prior the study day
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Smoking, snuff use or intake of drugs during the last 7 days prior the study day
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Intake of alcohol during the last 24 hours prior the study day
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Intake of coffee and tea during the last 12 hours prior the study day
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has RRMS, but is willing to comply with study restrictions. No chronic pain or high blood pressure mentioned.
